name: spei
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, w0)
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, w0)
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)
-| w1
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, w0)
-| w1
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Inference from existential specialization, using implicit substitution. Remove a distinct variable constraint. (Contributed by NM, 19-Aug-1993.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 12-May-2018.)
